info: Explore real-world locations to search for different kinds of pokemon! You can catch them by tapping on the Pokemon and flicking a Poke Ball at it.
These are real-world locations that are marked as stops for you to get items, like Pokeballs and potion, to use in the game.

Try to discover and catch at least one of every Pokemon available. You can discover more Pokemon by evolving your Pokémon, which can be done by collecting lots of the same Pokemon and transferring them to get candies for evolution! Also, you can gather items at PokeStops, maybe getting an egg, and walking around for the egg to hatch into Pokemon!

When you reach level 5, you can pick a team to join and can fight at a gym where other team members have placed their Pokemon. Training Pokemon at your team’s gym will increase prestige points, which will make the gym harder for the other teams to take over.
